brand.name: 1st Step Flooring
brand.description: Building delightful experiences with modern design systems, thoughtful engineering, and scalable architecture.

hero-home.headline: Premium Flooring Solutions Perfectly Installed
hero-home.subheadline: Transform your space with designer finishes, precise installation, and trust with every step.
hero-home.formSubheadline: Share your info and we’ll confirm a site visit within 24 hours.

review-data.heading: Facebook reviews from real clients
review-data.subheading: Dust-free installs, on-time schedules, and premium finishes—straight from homeowners, designers, and GC partners.

reviews.name: Ahmad Reda
reviews.content: Antonio was professional and completed the flooring job on time and to a very high standard. Would definitely use 1st Step Floors again.

reviews.name: Julie Kane
reviews.content: Antonio did a fantastic job on our new floor. He was very reliable, friendly, professional and very reasonably priced. We highly recommend 1st Step Floors to everyone.

reviews.name: Linda Langford
reviews.content: Absolutely love our new floor. Antonio was very professional and prompt. Nothing was too difficult. Definitely give Antonio a call if you’re looking for new flooring you won’t be disappointed.

benefits-section.bgAlt: Premium flooring installation with high-end finishes
title: Premium
Benefits

how-it-works.headline: How our flooring installation works
how-it-works.subheadline: A transparent four step workflow built to minimize downtime and keep every detail on schedule.

steps.title: Book your estimate
steps.desc: Tell us about your space and ideal timeline. We’ll confirm a site visit within 24 hours.

steps.title: On-site measurements
steps.desc: Our specialists inspect subfloors, measure precisely, and flag any prep work needed.

steps.title: Select materials
steps.desc: Choose from curated hardwood, LVP, tile, or laminate samples tailored to your lifestyle.

steps.title: Expert installation
steps.desc: Once the quote is accepted and invoice is paid our certified installers complete the job, on time with care

flooring-gallery.heading: Flooring styles we install
flooring-gallery.subheading: From engineered hardwood to large-format tile, our crews deliver showroom finishes with job-site precision.

items.name: Hybrid Vinyl Planks
items.subtitle: SPC · Standard Flooring
items.description: Stone plastic composite flooring, a dense rigid core made from ground stone.

items.name: Engineered Flooring
items.subtitle: Real Timber · Hard Wood Top
items.description: Engineered timber flooring is a real wood floor made from multiple bonded layers.

items.name: Hybrid Herringbone
items.subtitle: Luxury Style Flooring
items.description: Herringbone Hybrid Flooring give you the luxury look of real timber flooring in a classic design with durability.

items.name: Spotted Gum Hybrid
items.subtitle: Wide Plank · 7mm
items.description: Realistic design made for a professional simplistic look.

items.name: Laminate
items.subtitle: Luxury Laminate · 12mm
items.description: Blackbutt laminate flooring, for a clean professional look.

items.name: Laminate Flooring
items.subtitle: Durable · 12mm · Laminate
items.description: Durable finishes engineered for everyday living and affordability.

featuredServicesSection.title: All Services

services.title: Flooring Repairs
services.summary: Removal of old flooring. We replace and install top quality flooring for your home.
services.imageAlt: Technician performing an emergency flooring repair

services.title: New Build Flooring
services.summary: Schedule your flooring for your new build. We professionally install and communicate with your builders.

services.title: Renovations & upgrades
services.summary: We install and upgrade your flooring, wether you have tiles or carpet there is no job we can't do.

firstService.heading: Timber Flooring Services
firstService.description: We provide high quality timber flooring solutions tailored to your home or business. From selection to installation, our team ensures a flawless finish with long lasting results.

features.title: Flooring Selection
features.description: Expert guidance to choose the perfect timber type, finish, and style for your space.

features.title: Professional Installation
features.description: Skilled installation for a flawless, durable timber floor that enhances any room.

features.title: Maintenance & Care
features.description: Advice and services to keep your timber flooring looking pristine for years to come.

deliveryOptions.title: On-Site Consultation
deliveryOptions.description: Our flooring experts visit your location to measure, advise, and recommend the best timber options.

deliveryOptions.title: Installation Service
deliveryOptions.description: Professional installation ensuring precision, efficiency, and a beautiful end result.

secondService.heading: New Build Flooring
secondService.description: Schedule your flooring for your new build. We professionally install and communicate with your builders.
secondService.noteText: All jobs are compliance with the builders regulation and requirements, we follow manufature compliance requiremetns to ensure you keep your warranty

thirdService.heading: Renovations & upgrades
thirdService.description: We install and upgrade your flooring, wether you have tiles or carpet there is no job we can't do.

cards.title: Flooring Options
cards.description: A wide range of timber types and finishes to suit any interior design and style preference.
